verses.text: Calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová. Manhxo jantacoc svach'il co b'itan b'it d'a co Diosal. Smojton val co b'itan d'ay yed' juntzanh b'it te vach'.
A Jehová sb'oanxi Jerusalén, ol smolb'ejxicot eb' quetisraelal sacleminac yajcanb'ati.
A tz'ak'an snivanil sk'ol eb' pitz'anoch cuselal d'a spixan. A' tz'anhtan syaelal eb' chi'.
A' na'annac jantac sb'isul q'uen k'anal sb'onac, yak'annacoch sb'i junjun q'ueen.
Yelxo val te nivan yelk'och co Diosal tic, nivan spoder, malaj slajvub'al sjelanil.
A' tz'ik'an q'ue vaan eb' anima emnaquil yeq'ui, palta a eb' sk'ulan chucal, tz'ik'chajcanem eb' sik'lab'il yuuj.
Co b'itejec Jehová yic scak'an yuj diosal yed' te' arpa sco b'itejec.
A' tz'ak'anoch asun d'a satchaanh, slajvi chi' syak'ancot nhab' d'a sat luum tic. A' tz'ak'an q'uib' anh ank'ultac d'a tzalquixtac.
Anhejton pax a' tz'ak'an svael nok' nok' yed' nok' yunetac joj ayic tz'el yav nok' yuj vejel.
A Jehová, max tzalajlaj yed' eb' anima tz'ak'anoch yip nok' chej, ma yipal eb' soldado yipoc sk'ool.
Palta stzalaj yed' eb' ay xivk'olal d'ay, aton eb' tz'ak'anoch svach'k'olal yipoc sk'ool.
Ex aj Jerusalén, calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová. Ex aj Sion, co b'itejec co Diosal.
A' tz'ak'anoch yip yijchuloc spuertail chonhab' Jerusalén, syak'anpax svach'k'olal d'a eb' cuninal.
A' tz'ak'an junk'olal d'a yol smacb'en co chonhab' tic, syak'anpax b'ud'joc yuj ixim trigo te vach'.
A' tz'ak'ancot slolonel d'a sat luum tic, elanhchamel tz'elk'ochi.
A co Diosal tz'ak'ancot q'uen sacb'acom icha yilji sac lana. A' tz'ak'anoch q'uen cheev pococal, icha q'uen tik'aq'uil taanh tz'ajcan q'ueen.
A' tz'ak'ancot q'uen sacb'at icha q'uen cotac q'ueen. Axo val sical q'ueen, malaj junoc mach stechaj yuuj.
Syalanpaxi to tz'ulaxb'at q'ueen, syak'ancot ik', yic sb'ey yalil q'ueen chi'.
A slolonel yed' sk'ayb'ub'al, ix yak' cojtaquejel a onh israel yinhtilal onh vinhaj Jacob tic.
Manh ichocta' ix yutej d'a junocxo nación. Maj yojtaquejel-laj sk'ayb'ub'al co Diosal juntzanhxo chonhab' chi'. Calec vach' lolonel d'a Jehová.
